title: Bent Over Two-Arm Long Barbell / T-Bar Rows
description: Hold and squeeze your back muscles. Return to the start position in a slow smooth movement to place emphasis on your lats. Inhale as you do so. Keep the bar from touching the floor. pause then repeat. This exercise can be performed using a cable station's low pulley or T-bar row machine. You can use a stirrup or double handle cable attachment to lift the weight by looping it under the end of the bar.
